${modID}:EventID.NAME: Event Name
DESCRIPTIONS: This is event text, generally used to describe what's happening.
You have to mark every word individually.
You can also use [#ffffff]white[] hex color codes like this to color text.
Hex color codes also work in card text! But not on keywords, without some workarounds.
OPTIONS: Select card to remove. (You can also stick extra text like this in here.)

${modID}:TheOrchard.NAME: The Orchard
DESCRIPTIONS: You find yourself in a lush, vibrant orchard filled with fruits of various sizes and colors. The air is fragrant with the smell of ripe produce, and a mystical energy emanates from the grove. An ethereal voice whispers, urging you to make a choice.

After you have made your choice, you feel the effects resonate through your body. The orchard seems to darken as the magic dissipates. You take a moment to admire the mystical grove before you continue your journey.
